title: Two men seated in booth in bar, with poster in background: Basketball and Dance, 4 Star Double Header, Bill Harris' Pittsburgh Crusaders with Patterson Johnson Mays Lewis etc., vs. the sensational Ohio State champs Dayton Bombers; Eddie Daniels Famous Coraopolis Paramount A.C. vs. the Beltzhoover Vets, Sunday January 27...Savoy Ballroom, after the game...Will Hitchcock and his orchestra
medium: black and white: Ansco Safety Film
provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
